title: Hard stuck and need tips
body: i didnt want to admit it but i might be hard stuck bronze. Ive been plaing ranked since S8 primarily and i cant climb. i main Kaisa and ADC, 70 games kai'sa and a 71% WR but i cant seem to climb. Help plz

replies.body:
How Much Lp are you getting every win?
How Much Lp are you losing every lost?
do you solo queue?
if you have a 71% winrate kai'sa why not just keep playing her? or try getting good with another adc just in case of a ban
and if you only can play kai'sa this might sound dumb but try playing her in other lanes not just adc just in case you dont get your role
also please try playing kai'sa in other lanes in draft not ranked LOL

- Take regular breaks from ranked to avoid the frustration. Go play another game (I love the Binding of Isaac for it) or another mode (ARAMs are good - less stress than 5s) for awhile.
- Broaden your champion pool, take on a different role thats easier to climb with if you want. If you're happy with ADC though then stick to what you're good with.
- Find a duo partner thats on the same page as you, probably a support main if you're an ADC main.
- If the players (allied or enemy) are getting on your nerves in chat, its sometimes best to /muteall from the beginning before anything else. It will still allow pings through, but it means you'll ignore what people say (Which can be pretty toxic in ranked).
I can help you with that if u want
